scripts.build: binge bootstrap && cross-env OUTPUT_MODE=webapps client-build clean info && npm run webpack:webapps
scripts.build:dev: client-build clean info && npm run webpack
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production client-build clean info && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run webpack
scripts.watch: binge bootstrap && cross-env OUTPUT_MODE=webapps client-build clean info && run-p "webpack:webapps -- --watch " "binge -- watch"
scripts.test:ci: echo no tests on the main app
scripts.test:grid: echo no tests on the main app
scripts.test: echo no tests on the main app
